name: Rescue Strike: Impossible Miss
description:
Rescue Strike: Impossible Mission is an army shooting game where you will become a special forces sniper. Terrorists occupied the city, creating chaos in the city, threatening innocent people. You accept the army's mission, go to the front, destroy the city's terrorists, restore the city's peace.

Features:

Practical Commando Condition
Fantastic HD Illustrations
Astounding Sound Impacts Smooth, simple, fun amusement play
Multi-activity and multi weapons for ambush
Extreme fun with expert marksman zooming
Astounding FPS Levels
